application

Class WebScrape

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.WebScrape

  • public class WebScrape
extends java.lang.Object
    A Class that will scrape text from given URL, add to a HashMap(of String, Integer) with all word entries and, finally, add each key/value pair to an ArrayList(of Word (Word implements Comparable(of Word))) so the ArrayList can be sorted by number of occurrences.
    Author:
    derekdileo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebScrape() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String[] parseSite(java.lang.String website, java.lang.String sourceHead, java.lang.String sourceEnd)
      A Method for scrubbing text from a user-requested URL which removes HTML tags from each line, splits each line into individual words, adds all to a String array and, finally, returns the array.
      static void wordsToDB(java.lang.String[] words)
      Use string array from parseSite() to push words to database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WebScrape

        public WebScrape()

    • Method Detail

      • parseSite

        public static java.lang.String[] parseSite(java.lang.String website,
                                           java.lang.String sourceHead,
                                           java.lang.String sourceEnd)
        A Method for scrubbing text from a user-requested URL which removes HTML tags from each line, splits each line into individual words, adds all to a String array and, finally, returns the array.
        Parameters:
        website - is the URL that the user wants to process
        sourceHead - is the first line of text to be processed by the application
        sourceEnd - is the last line of text to be processed by the application
        Returns:
        String[] which contains every word on the requested site
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • wordsToDB

        public static void wordsToDB(java.lang.String[] words)
        Use string array from parseSite() to push words to database.
        Parameters:
        words - is a string array created by parseSite() method which contains every word (and its multiples) that was parsed.
